name: Titanic - Machine Learning from Disaster
description: The Titanic dataset is a classic machine learning problem. Predict which passengers survived the Titanic shipwreck.

name: House Prices - Advanced Regression Techniques
description: Use advanced regression techniques to predict house prices based on various features of the house.

name: Digit Recognizer - Handwritten Digit Classification
description: Use computer vision techniques to classify handwritten digits from images.
